thread.title: Meat Loaf rescues abandoned puppy while on tour
thread.title_full: Meat Loaf rescues abandoned puppy while on tour

title: Meat Loaf rescues abandoned puppy while on tour
text:
Posted: 12:58 p.m.   Meat Loaf rescues abandoned puppy while on tour By Cox Media Group National Content Desk ALBUQUERQUE — 
There’s a new four-legged member of rocker Meat Loaf’s extended family. 
The singer recently performed in Albuquerque. After a rehearsal, his road crew saw someone leave a puppy behind a dumpster. 
Meat Loaf’s crew rescued her and named her Little Ms. Karma. Photos on Meat Loaf’s Facebook page show him holding the adorable puppy. 
Some of you already know that the other night after our rehearsal, our crew saw someone dumping this beautiful baby girl... Posted by Meat Loaf on Saturday, October 17, 2015 
The puppy temporarily joined the band on the road, but now has found a forever home with a crew member on a “big ole ranch,” according to Meat Loaf. He went on to comment that “there was no option of a shelter or stranger.” He wrote that he and the band miss the dog but are “excited that she’s staying a part of the extended Meat Loaf family forever.”
